name: Dead Man's Trail - coming to PC/Mac/Linux and mobile
blurb: DMT is a zombie survival game combining the adventure of The Oregon Trail with the thrill of 3D dungeon crawlers.

rewards.reward: No Reward

Afterlife - Your memory shall live on forever: you can contribute one sentence to a hidden document findable by players IN THE GAME! You also earn our 'undead' gratitude AND you will be listed on our web page as a Kickstarter contributor... we may even remember to not EAT YOU.
BITTEN - Your name in the credits and access to the developer's forum interacting with the developers and other contributors.
BRAINS - One digital copy of DMT (iOS or Android) and an exclusive HD desktop Wallpaper and access to the developer's forum interacting with the developers and other contributors.

PC EARLY BIRD: Get a copy of the game for PC/Mac/Linux + Get the digital art book AND a digital download of the DMT soundtrack + a 10-pack of Exclusive HD DMT wallpapers, and access to the developer's forum interacting with the developers and other contributors.

ZOMBIE - Two digital copies of the Game (iOS or Android - one for you and one to "infect" a friend), three exclusive HD DMT Wallpapers, and access to the developer's forum interacting with the developers and other contributors.
PC ANIMAL - Two digital copies of the Game (PC/Mac/Linux) and a 5-pack of Exclusive HD DMT Wallpapers and access to the developer's forum interacting with the developers and other contributors.

ZOMBIE ANIMAL - Three digital copies of the Game (iOS or Android) and a 5-pack of Exclusive HD DMT Wallpapers and access to the developer's forum interacting with the developers and other contributors.

ZOMBIE ANIMAL - Three digital copies of the Game (you tell us which platforms you want it on) and a 5-pack of Exclusive HD DMT Wallpapers and access to the developer's forum interacting with the developers and other contributors.

PC ZOMBIE EARLY BIRD - Five digital copies of the Game (PC/Mac/Linux) + 20 DMT Stickers + a 10-pack of Exclusive HD DMT wallpapers + One DMT poster (18" x 24") and access to the developer's forum interacting with the developers and other contributors.

ZOMBIE EARLY BIRD - Five digital copies of the Game (you tell us which platforms you want it on) + 20 DMT Stickers + a 10-pack of Exclusive HD DMT wallpapers + One DMT poster (18" x 24") and access to the developer's forum interacting with the developers and other contributors.

ZOMBIE EARLY BIRD - Ten digital copies of the Game (iOS or Android) + 20 DMT Stickers + a 10-pack of Exclusive HD DMT wallpapers + One DMT poster (18" x 24") and access to the developer's forum interacting with the developers and other contributors.

ARTSY ZOMBIE - Get a digital art book + five digital copies of the Game + a 10-pack of Exclusive HD DMT wallpapers, and access to the developer's forum interacting with the developers and other contributors.

MUSICAL ZOMBIE - Get a digital download of the DMT soundtrack + five digital copies of the Game + a 10-pack of Exclusive HD DMT wallpapers, and access to the developer's forum interacting with the developers and other contributors.

BIKERS FOR BACKERS - Backers at this level receive a Kickstarter exclusive Biker character, crossbow weapon, and biker gang vehicle along with a copy of Dead Man's Trail for a platform of their choice + 10 digital wallpapers. Backers at all levels above this one also receive the Bikers for Backers content pack.

SURVIVAL BUNKER - You want all the digital content you can get! Get the digital art book AND a digital download of the DMT soundtrack + ten digital copies of the Game + a 10-pack of Exclusive HD DMT wallpapers, and access to the developer's forum interacting with the developers and other contributors.

TRAVELER - Kickstarter supporters EXCLUSIVE Custom T-Shirt + One digital copy of DMT + 20 DMT Stickers + Exclusive HD desktop Wallpaper + DMT Poster (18 x 24) and access to the developer's forum interacting with the developers and other contributors.

DRIVER - Plush Toy of a DMT Playable Character (Your Choice) + Forum voting privileges (vote on aspects of the game) + the digital art book + a digital download of the DMT soundtrack + one digital copy of DMT + 20 DMT Stickers + Exclusive HD desktop Wallpaper + DMT Poster (18 x 24)
ZOMBIE FIGHTER - Customized DMT COIN of the main characters & Zombies in the game + One digital copy of DMT (iOS or Android) + 20 DMT Stickers + Exclusive HD desktop Wallpaper + DMT Poster

ASSOCIATE ZOMBIE - This Limited Reward will enable you to be listed by name in the credits as an ASSOCIATE PRODUCER. And One digital copy of DMT (iOS or Android) + 20 DMT Stickers + Exclusive HD desktop Wallpaper

SURVIVALIST - You will be given access to Beta Play testing will be listed in the game's credits as "Beta Tester" + you get access to "BETA tester ONLY" live chat during Beta testing with the developers + Custom DMT Beta Tester Hoodie!!! + the digital art book + a digital download of the DMT soundtrack +One digital copy of DMT + 20 DMT Stickers + Exclusive HD desktop Wallpaper + DMT Poster

PRESERVATIONIST - You're keeping human culture alive! One softcover art book signed by the developers + one signed physical copy of the soundtrack signed by the developers + the DMT backer t-shirt + one digital copy of DMT + 20 DMT Stickers + Exclusive HD desktop Wallpaper + DMT Poster
ZOMBIE KILLER - Plush Toy of YOU as a Zombie (Must submit a high res picture or yourself) + One digital copy of DMT (iOS or Android) + 20 DMT Stickers + Exclusive HD desktop Wallpaper + DMT Poster

ZOMBIE HUNTER - Toy model of DMT Character, Zombie, or Vehicle + YOUR NAME will be memorialized IN THE GAME (Our choice of your first, last, or nickname) + One digital copy of DMT + 20 DMT Stickers + Exclusive HD desktop Wallpaper + DMT Poster
ZOMBIE STYLE - Custom DMT Kickstarter Contributor Hoodie!!! + One digital copy of DMT + 20 DMT Stickers + Exclusive HD desktop Wallpaper + DMT Poster

CONCEPT ZOMBIE - This Limited Reward will enable you to help select specific zombie character art to be used in DMT. And, you will be listed by name in the credits as a CONCEPT ARTIST. You will also receive one digital copy of DMT + 20 DMT Stickers + Exclusive HD desktop Wallpaper

SURVIVOR PRO - A Custom DMT Character based on a character YOU design! (With our help and approval of course!) + One digital copy of DMT + 20 DMT Stickers + Exclusive HD desktop Wallpaper + DMT Poster

SURVIVOR HERO - You will be given access to Alpha testing will be listed in the game's credits as "Alpha Tester" + Custom DMT Alpha Tester Hoodie!!! + One digital copy of DMT + 20 DMT Stickers + Exclusive HD desktop Wallpaper + DMT Poster

SURVIVOR LORD - A Zombie in the game based on YOU! (High Res photo required) +  Custom DMT SURVIVOR LORD Polo!!! + One softcover art book + one physical copy of the soundtrack + One digital copy of DMT + 20 DMT Stickers + Exclusive HD desktop Wallpaper + DMT Poster

SURVIVOR LEGEND - Direct input into the game development. We'll interact with you regularly about the game's elements and will incorporate your ideas (if feasible) + One softcover art book + one physical copy of the soundtrack + One digital copy of DMT + DMT Stickers + Exclusive HD desktop Wallpaper + DMT Poster

SURVIVOR KING - You will be flown (domestic airfare, coach class\u00a0only) to Washington DC to enjoy a lunch and Dinner with the development team. We'll sign whatever you want us to sign & answer all your questions. We'll put you up overnight and send you back home happy, fed, and with (extra baggage charges from all the goodies we'll load you down with!) + One digital copy of DMT + DMT Stickers + Exclusive HD desktop Wallpaper + DMT Poster

You obviously have faith in us and are REALLY looking forward to this game, so are WE!!! You'll have virtually unrestricted access to the development team's meetings (in person if you desire) or telephonically as we hold them (at least weekly). And you'll listen as long as you like as we pitch our other ideas to you\u2026 yea that's the ticket!!! Plus ALL of the above (Excludes SURVIVOR KING. You can have just about ANYTHING you want! well... almost anything).
